geese.name: Poster Goose
geese.description: This goose is the first one who appears if you google 'goose' so it gets to be here

geese.name: Angry Fellow
geese.description: You have dared to approach this rather rotund fellow, you will regret such an endeavour

geese.name: The Calm One
geese.description: Even in the most fiery of situations, this goose will remain perfectly calm. One could say he is based.

geese.name: Evil Eye
geese.description: Once you make eye contact, you are locked in this goose's eerie gaze for the short remainder of your lifetime as it rapidly approaches you

geese.name: Goose Bong
geese.description: Get stoned in style with this goose themed bong

geese.name: Gangsta Goose
geese.description: This absolute G has arms and isn't afraid to use them

geese.name: The Sphere
geese.description: The Sphere is able to instantly incapacitate all enemies by way of an attack similar to Sonic's dash.

geese.name: The Twins
geese.description: Double the geese, double the honking.

geese.name: Dogthroater
geese.description: This goose will reach down your throat and steal your internal organs. The motive is unknown.

geese.name: Plural Banana
geese.description: the banan return in greater numbers

geese.name: The Goosciples
geese.description: These geese are completely dedicated to The Goose Lord (pictured, 1st from top, third from right), and will submit to his will, no matter what it is

geese.name: The Classy Ones
geese.description: The Classy Ones are the fanciest geese in town. They look down upon you, as an inferior peasant.
